frontmatter.title: Lab: Connect PromptForge with APIs

labPresets.initialPrompt: Demonstrate connecting to an external API (e.g., weather or dictionary) using PromptForge. Retrieve the data and integrate it into a structured response.

examples: Connect to a weather API and provide tomorrow’s forecast in JSON format.
Use a dictionary API to define 'artificial intelligence' and return the definition in Markdown.

quiz.q: True or False: PromptForge can integrate with external APIs to enhance prompt outputs.
What is the key purpose of connecting APIs with PromptForge?
choices: To augment outputs with real-world data
To eliminate the need for credits
quiz.answer: To augment outputs with real-world data
